messages.title: A better plan. A better future.
messages.content: Labour has a better plan for a better future. A plan that will change Britain so hard work is rewarded and the NHS is secured for years to come.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Balance the books and cut the deficit every year while securing the future of the NHS.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Higher living standards for working families
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Freeze energy bills until 2017, ban exploitative zero-hours contracts, and raise minimum wage to more than £8 by October 2019.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: An NHS with the time to care
keyPolicies.policyDescription: 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs, joining up services from home to hospital, guaranteeing GP appointments within 48 hours and cancer tests within one week.
People coming to the UK won't be able to claim benefits for at least two years.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A country where the next generation can do better than the last
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Tuition fees reduced to £6,000 and an apprenticeship for every school leaver.

issues.economy: Balance the books and cut the deficit every year while securing the future of the NHS.
issues.education: Tuition fees reduced to £6,000, apprenticeships for every school leaver, smaller class sizes for 5, 6 & 7 year-olds.
issues.health: 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs, joining up services from home to hospital, guaranteeing GP appointments within 48 hours and cancer tests within one week.
issues.immigration: People coming here won't be able to claim benefits for at least two years and new rules making it illegal for employers to undercut wages by exploiting workers.

endorsements.endorsement: Labour has a better plan for a better future. A plan that will change Britain so hard work is rewarded and the NHS is secured for years to come.

quotes.text: Labour has a better plan for a better future. A plan that will change Britain so hard work is rewarded and the NHS is secured for years to come.

images.caption: Front cover of a Labour campaign leaflet titled 'A better plan. A better future'.
Page with key pledges from the Labour campaign.
